channel.title: DeathlyPVPZ update restarter
channel.description: So probs been asked before I want to add update and re-starter command to safely update instead of people loosing their stuff

item.title: DeathlyPVPZ update restarter
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

keithz118:

Thanks will that also log everyone out and save their player profiles??

No. As I said:

sk8rdude461:

That’s the ‘update’ command. the rest you have to do when the system executes the update

All that command does is tell the server to send the numbers to all the logged in clients.

When the numbers hit 0, that’s when you need to execute the saving and the logging out.[quote=“keithz118, post:3, topic:552393”]also looking at adding the control panel that trisidia has anyone any look with this?[/quote]
The control panel in Trisidia was released ages ago…
Assuming you’re talking about the one that looks close to this:

Which is found here:

rune-server.ee

[PI] Adding My Control Panel to Your Server!

Rune-Server

keithz118:

Respect to Hack3r for the release of deathlypvpz

Not really. His code is terrible, all he did was make a server in a worse state than the original PI. The only reason people like his releases is because they’re full of shit. Shit that was added in a very terrible manner.

Read full topic

item.title: DeathlyPVPZ update restarter
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
That’s the ‘update’ command. the rest you have to do when the system executes the update

Read full topic
